pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spectral Response Data for Light Sensors // Spectral response data for broadband ultraviolet and visible radiation sensors. Different data sources were used: author-supplied data from scientific research papers, sensor-manufacturer supplied data, and published sensor specifications. Part of the 'r4photobiology' suite Aphalo P. J. (2015) doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14.
